metadata.title: NA members congratulates Senator Capt. Shaheen Khalid Butt on PBM appointment

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 07 (APP):Members of the National Assembly, Dr Tariq Fazal Chaudhry, Malik Ibrar Ahmed, and Anjum Aqeel Khan, visited the Pakistan Bait-ul-Mal (PBM) head office on Tuesday. During the visit, the lawmakers extended their heartfelt congratulations to Senator Capt. Shaheen Khalid Butt on his recent appointment as the Managing Director of PBM.
content.summary: Members of the National Assembly visited the Pakistan Bait-ul-Mal head office to congratulate Senator Capt. Shaheen Khalid Butt on his recent appointment as Managing Director.
